OOC: You assume correctly.

The bot groans and sits up, looking sheepishly at Nightlight.

"Uh, yeah, I think.  Come here often?" he quips weakly.  Now that the 
immediate crisis is over with, his normal, happy-go-lucky nature is 
returning.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> OOC: I assume that the bot landed near of Blackfang and Nightlight.
>

> 
> "Did you saw..." said Nightlight but she didn't end the phrase, she

> you... all right?"
